sources.title: Hunted Men (1938)
sources.description: Lloyd Nolan, Mary Carlisle, J. Carrol Naish, Buster Crabbe co-written by Horace McCoy

metadata.Plot: racketeer Joe Albany kills James Flowers when he discovers he is embezzling from the club they own. Hardware salesman Peter Harris accidentally hits Joe with his car. Peter is drunk that Joe is able to con him into believing that he is Charles Edwards, a fellow hardware man who was with him at a convention, accompanies Peter to his suburban home.
metadata.Writer: Marian Grant, Albert Duffy, Horace McCoy
metadata.Actors: Lloyd Nolan, Mary Carlisle, Lynne Overman
